Text:
This game is very immersive and addictive , crashes a bit but the gameplay is totally worth it.
Totally purchasing it

Thank you so much!

@schrade

This is a pre-alpha game, crashes are something that you will always have. Although this version is already outdated, so maybe try a newer version.
